text_block_list.text:
It's the day of the Selection Race, where the trainers scout out 
the abilities of the horsegirls and form partnerships. 
I had just arrived at the grounds and as I looked around—

Hey, hey, hey! You're the trainer from the other day!! 
I'm so glad you're here!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
It's been nothing but great! Always ready, always prepared! 
That's what makes a class president!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Now, I'll be in the next race!! 
Please observe my excellence! ……Don't expect anything less!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Now excuse me! Bakushin bakushiiin!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Huh? Sakura Bakushin O is running next? 
I thought short distances were her forte…
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
She's registered to run in the long distance. 
Does she have something up her sleeve…?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: That was how the race started. Sakura Bakushin O was…
Here I go!! Bakushin bakushin!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O makes a quick start!! 
She's pulling away from the rest of the field!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
I'm not done yet! 
Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Bakushin O leads! Bakushin O leads!! 
What fearsome acceleration! She's got lightning in her legs!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (Woooooaaaaaaah!!)

The race had barely started, and the audience already erupted. 
But her performance was so amazing that my mind had already just 
accepted this bizarre scene.

Hey, isn't she going too early!? 
If she goes that hard from the start of… no, but…!
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
What amazing speed…! 
I've never seen such a fast start before…!!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: If she keeps going like this, maybe…!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: …It wasn't long before excited voices surrounded me.

They've reached the fourth corner! 
Each horsegirl is waiting for the right moment to strike—
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Bakushin… Bakushiiiin…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
S-Sakura Bakushin O is dropping back!? 
Where has her momentum gone!?
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: I'm out… of… energy…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Ahhh…
text_block_list.name: Trainers

text_block_list.text:
Soon, Sakura Bakushin O slipped down the rankings and 
eventually finished in 12th place…

Gahh, 12th place…! 
The disappointment…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: Your start was great, too bad.
You started great, it's a shame.

text_block_list.text: No… everyone was fast this time!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Honestly acknowledging competitors is 
what makes a class president!! 
Wah, so noble, I could be a princess!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are. Hey, Sakura Bakushin O! 
Can I talk to you for a moment?
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
By talk you must mean scout, right? 
Of course, of course, I've been waiting!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Oh, I… see. Thank you for agreeing. 
Shame about the result, but your pace was amazing! 
I'd love to recruit you.
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I will make you a top sprinter!! 
You can be world class in short distance!!
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Indeed! Yessir! 
Let's take on the sprinter's—
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Hmm? Sprinter?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Yeah… did I say something funny? Based on the race you just ran, 
you have a clear aptitude for short distances, right?
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text: I see, I see. So that's what you were thinking.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Then I'll have to decline! 
Thank you for reaching out to me! The way back's over there!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Wha!? Ah, hey…!!
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Looking quite confused, the trainer who had reached out to her 
wandered away, swept up in Sakura Bakushin O's momentum.

Phew, what a shame!! 
But with every farewell comes a new encounter!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Speaking of — you've been standing there watching me 
for a while now! Don't you have something to say to me!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Or… were you planning to recruit me as a "sprinter" too?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
If you can't resolutely give me a "NO", then — as much as it 
pains me — I must decline!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry! I juuuust can't seem to 
limit myself to short distances!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: Why are you so particular about that?
Why are you so particular about this?

text_block_list.text: That's because I am the class president!!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Here's a question for you! Name a G1 race 
that is not a sprint race. Go on!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Yes, exactly! …You understand, don't you?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
There are soooo many! 
So many more than just short distance races I need to win!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Didn't I tell you the other day? 
I am the class president, and the class president is me!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: I'm going to be everyone's role model!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
What do you think of when you hear the 
phrase "exemplary horsegirl"?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Sprinters? Milers? Stayers? 
—No, exemplary is being all of these!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: And that's why! I'm a class president!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
So, my apologies. I'll leave you to it!! 
Bakushin bakushiiin!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: I was rejected before even opening my mouth…
